content: this holds a cake of sock yarn for on the go edit 8/17/08 i redesigned the bottom of the bag it was coming out too large if you printed off the instructions before today please look at the new ones i am sorry for any inconvenience this causes edit 8/15/08 this bag is crocheted rather tightly if you are not getting a firm fabric you might want to drop down a hook size or two not really a gauge but a necessity for holding up to usage
